name: Sky Lord: The Gathering
description:
Challenging & Addictive.

Inspired By Netstorm, Tower Defense & RTS Genre

You play as Blue, you have 5 Bases to Protect On The Left Of The Game Screen.

You Must Attack & Destroy the Red Enemy Bases On The Right.

INSTRUCTIONS

Once Loaded, Click On The Planet to Begin The Game.

Choose a Level and Begin.

Full Instructions To Follow, For Now Just Experiment & Enjoy.

Created In Gamemaker Studio

Next Steps... Improved GUI and Visuals

Currently Creating a Tutorial Video - to follow soon.
